entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Slave Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -9.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Slave Lake Airport 4:19 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -9.4°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -10.3°C
Wind: E 18 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening with risk of freezing rain. Fog patches developing in the evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
